original_text: And the chief of the house of the father of the families of Merari was Zuriel the son of Abihail: these shall pitch on the side of the tabernacle northward.
korean_text: 아비하일의 아들 수리엘은 므라리 종족과 조상의 가문의 지휘관이 될 것이요 이 종족은 성막 북쪽에 진을 칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: And the chief of the house of the father
was Zuriel the son of Abihail
on the side of the tabernacle northward
